item.title: The value of mortgage advice
item.dc:creator: Rachael Khan
item.description: Mortgages – Sorting the fact from the fiction Lindsay and Sam have just found out they’re expecting their first baby. Although they’re excited at the prospect of starting a family, it’s come as a bit of a surprise and their current living situation is far from ideal.
